rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall for receiving guests, with a Vastu-compliant east facing entry.
Large living area with modern Chettinad-style interior elements and ample natural light from the south.
Dining area integrated with the living room for seamless flow.
Chettinad kitchen design, north-facing to ensure auspicious energy as per Vastu.
Master bedroom with south-west orientation offering privacy and calmness.
Second bedroom placed on the east side for positive energy flow.
Third bedroom aligned towards the north-east to balance energies.
Main bathroom located near the master bedroom with Vastu-compliant water placement.
Dedicated home office in a quiet north-west corner to ensure focus and productivity.
Private gym located adjacent to the master bedroom for convenience and privacy.

openings.description: Main entry door with a welcoming arch design, aligning with Vastu principles.
Service entry door providing an alternative access point in accordance with Vastu.
Garage entry door for vehicles ensuring secure and convenient access.
Balcony window to enhance natural ventilation and morning light as per Vastu.

courtyard.description: Central courtyard designed in a Chettinad style for communal space, ensuring balanced energy flow with a water feature and greenery.
